title: well done!
review: This movie was artfully created and gave me insight into a part of the human experience which I was not familiar with. I highly recommend it!

title: Thoughtful, creative, honest - a tour de force!
review:
This is one of these films that is so captivating and artfully created - you don't know what hit you, but find yourself engrossed in the story. The direction was pitch-perfect. From camera movement and angles, to pace and editing, to music. It was so masterfully done - an honest look at a very complex relationship.

The filmmakers didn't oversimplify a complicated subject matter and complicated feelings. I really really enjoyed it!

title: Artfully Done
review: Moving film that captures a unique and intimate relationship. Interesting story that enters into a seldom told worldview while keeping you glued to your seat and entertained. Full of heart and very dramatic while still including a love story and some laughs. Highly recommend!
